statements: SELECT * FROM legal_data_analysis;
SELECT case_name, lawyer_name, court_name FROM legal_data_analysis;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_type FROM legal_data_analysis ORDER BY case_type DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT court_name FROM legal_data_analysis;
SELECT case_name, case_date FROM legal_data_analysis WHERE case_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM legal_data_analysis ORDER BY case_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT case_id, lawyer_name, case_date FROM legal_data_analysis WHERE case_type='Civil' AND court_name='Supreme Court' ORDER BY case_date ASC;
SELECT case_name, lawyer_name, case_description FROM legal_data_analysis WHERE case_name LIKE 'A%' AND lawyer_name='James Smith' ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM legal_data_analysis WHERE case_type='Criminal' AND case_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY case_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM legal_data_analysis WHERE case_type='Corporate' OR case_description LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY lawyer_name ASC, case_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_type, lawyer_name FROM legal_cases WHERE case_type='Civil';
SELECT entity_name, entity_type, entity_address FROM legal_entities ORDER BY entity_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT court_location FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, lawyer_name, case_date FROM legal_cases WHERE lawyer_name='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_type = 'Criminal' ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, lawyer_name, court_location FROM legal_cases WHERE lawyer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT case_name, court_location FROM legal_cases WHERE case_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT entity_name, entity_type, entity_phone FROM legal_entities WHERE entity_type = 'Law Firm' ORDER BY entity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases JOIN legal_entities ON legal_cases.lawyer_name = legal_entities.entity_name;
SELECT * FROM LegalDocs WHERE doc_type = 'Contract'
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_specialty FROM Lawyers WHERE lawyer_experience > 5
SELECT doc_id, doc_contents FROM LegalDocs ORDER BY upload_date DESC
SELECT * FROM CourtCases WHERE case_status = 'Closed' LIMIT 10
SELECT case_type, case_description FROM CourtCases
SELECT * FROM LegalDocs WHERE doc_type = 'Agreement';
SELECT doc_id, doc_type FROM LegalDocs WHERE upload_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_specialty, lawyer_experience FROM Lawyers WHERE lawyer_specialty = 'Criminal Defense';
SELECT * FROM CourtCases WHERE case_type = 'Civil' AND case_status = 'Open' ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_specialty, COUNT(*) AS num_cases FROM Lawyers JOIN CourtCases ON Lawyers.lawyer_id = CourtCases.case_id GROUP BY lawyer_id HAVING num_cases > 3;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_name, court_location FROM legal_cases;
SELECT lawyer_name, practice_area FROM lawyers ORDER BY lawyer_rating DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_type, client_location FROM clients WHERE client_type = 'individual';
SELECT case_name, case_description, court_location FROM legal_cases WHERE court_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases ORDER BY case_name DESC;
SELECT lawyer_name, practice_area FROM lawyers WHERE lawyer_rating > 4.0;
SELECT client_name, client_type, client_location FROM clients WHERE client_location = 'New York';
SELECT case_name, case_description, court_location FROM legal_cases WHERE court_location = 'Washington';
SELECT ld.document_type, lc.case_name FROM legal_documents ld INNER JOIN legal_cases lc ON ld.case_id = lc.case_id;
SELECT * FROM case_details;
SELECT case_title, filing_date FROM case_details WHERE jurisdiction='USA';
SELECT entity_name, entity_type, location FROM legal_entities WHERE industry='Technology' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM lawyer_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM case_documents WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM case_details ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT lawyer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM lawyer_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT entity_name, location, industry FROM legal_entities WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY location;
SELECT case_id, document_name, document_type, upload_date FROM case_documents WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT note_id, note_text, author_id, note_date FROM case_notes WHERE note_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY note_date ASC;
